meanings.sent1: The multisided shape of the crystal reflected light in different directions.
meanings.sent2: The team considered the multisided approach to solving the problem.
meanings.sent3: The multisided debate about the best pizza toppings kept everyone entertained.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was as multisided as a diamond, with many facets to discover.
meanings.sent5: The multisided nature of the issue made it challenging to find a simple solution.

meanings.sent1: The multisided negotiation involved representatives from various departments.
meanings.sent2: The project required a multisided agreement among all stakeholders.
meanings.sent3: The multisided argument at the meeting left everyone scratching their heads.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a multisided prism, able to see things from different angles.
meanings.sent5: The multisided nature of politics can make decision-making complex.
